author: cms-nanoAOD
body:
#### PR description:

This PR includes updates for NanoAODv7.
A second PR will come very soon with minor additions, but in the meanwhile we can start checking this.
No other workflows are expected to be modified.

Summary of changes:
- updated betastar variables for jets
- fixed gen-photon matching
- updated b-jet and c-jet energy regressions
- consolidate electron trigger object filter bit definitions across years
- added filter bits for high pt electron and muon triggers
- updated muon selectors
- minor fixes and additional variables in fat jets
- added isolated gen-level photons
- fixes to event counters and weight sums
- fix muon IP sign
- updated photon IDs (esp. added Fall17v2 to 2016)
- JetMET info additions (unclustered MET, PUPPI MET total uncertainties)
- added SC energy for electrons
- critical fixes to gen weights storage in randomized parameter scans
- additional LHE info for MG reweighting
title: NanoAODv7 code updates, part 1
